images.prompt: Amidst a vertical split-frame of haunting grandeur, an obsidian she-beast emerges from a swirling veil of violet haze and shimmering gold sparks, her ornate gothic form illuminated by a wireless flicker that dances across dissolving skin, revealing intricate layers of shadow and light as her imposing figure exudes a sinister elegance, her piercing eyes and jagged horns blending seamlessly into the darkly luminous environment, where every detail— from the delicate filigree on her arched collar to the flickering sparks that trace her sinewy limbs— converges in a hyper-realistic digital masterpiece that wavers between surreal nightmare and exquisite fantasy, capturing an atmosphere thick with mystery and decadence, inviting viewers into a realm where gothic opulence meets uncanny beauty in perpetual transformation.
